summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9498 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14907 lux), cloud levels (up 1906 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 326.3m lower than yesterday, 829.9m lower than the past week, 1905.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 740.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1570.6m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and calm and still conditions are expected. Light to moderate rain is forecast, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
